price: Hindi sila makatitikim doon ng isang lamig ni isang inumin,
arabic: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرۡدٗا وَلَا شَرَابًا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā bardan walā sharāban
